channel.title: Wielding Q
channel.description:
When wielding custom made items, it will only let me wield them seperately.
Eg: When wielding legs, I can't wield body with the legs, it removes the legs and puts on the body.
How can I fix this? ^^
Any help much appreciated.

item.title: Wielding Q
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

[quote=“dear god, post:5, topic:266174”]weildposition.

The one for legs and body is different, however your probably using the legs for the body position. It’s done in numbers.[/quote]

They wield fine when wielding on their own -_-;

The wield positions I have are 1 and 6, unless i’ve quick glance and misread on from other line lol ^^

Read full topic

item.title: Wielding Q
item.dc:creator: @dear_god1 dear god
item.description:
@dear_god1 wrote:

weildposition.

The one for legs and body is different, however your probably using the legs for the body position. It’s done in numbers.

Read full topic

item.title: Wielding Q
item.dc:creator: @snoopy89 snoopy89
item.description:
@snoopy89 wrote:

[quote=“yong min, post:3, topic:266174”]Thanks, Snoop.

I did do that, they wield perfect on their own, just not together -_-;

Do you know exactly what to change for it to be able to wield them together?[/quote]

Is hard to know exacly your problen when you do not upload your changes or quote them here.

But it looks like you used 1 thing with an other thing that makes them force to switch.

Read full topic

item.description:
@snoopy89 wrote:

itemwielabledef.xml in def/extra

Scroll down to the end.
